function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor coordination between health authorities and urban stakeholders","Impact":"Ineffective response to epidemic outbreaks in urban areas","Mitigation":"Establishing better communication and coordination between health authorities, local governments, and urban stakeholders","Technologies":"Communication tools and platforms for effective coordination","People":"Health authorities, urban stakeholders, local governments","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to water and sanitation in informal urban settlements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving access to water and sanitation facilities in informal urban settlements","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, water purification systems","People":"Residents of informal urban settlements","Owner":"Local governments, humanitarian organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges related to social, political, and economic contexts influencing vulnerability to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Limited ability to take action to mitigate vulnerability in different contexts","Mitigation":"Addressing social and economic inequalities, promoting community-based processes, and engaging with local leaders","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analysis tools for identifying vulnerable populations","People":"Vulnerable populations in urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations"}]}
